submission:
from typing import List
class Solution:
    def numberOfAlternatingGroups(self, colors: List[int], k: int) -> int:

        num_Found = 0
        i = 0
        j = 1
        n = len(colors)
    
        while j < n + k and i < n:
            tempJ = j
            tempEnd = tempJ % n
        
            while colors[tempEnd] != colors[(tempEnd - 1 + n) % n] and tempJ < n + k - 1:
                tempJ += 1
                tempEnd = tempJ % n
        
            num_Found += max(tempJ - i - k + 1, 0)
            i = tempJ
            j = i + 1
    
        return num_Found
